subject: From Morris Brehen
body:
From Morris Brehen
Dear Sir
Why have you  kept quiet  while the Barclays bank has been using your inheritance approved funds in given out loans to business investors  since beginning of  this year , why must you keep your $18millon  and your accrued interest of $475,000 at Barclays Bank PLC because of $850  administrative funds release processing  fee which you were asked to provide  , now the year 2023  is ending you are still there wake up from you slumber  and claim what rightly belongs to you and if any one is telling  you that you must get it free the person is completely deceiving you , no inheritance funds that is gotten free of charge none, there must be a form of one documentation or the other to legalize such funds release that was why the $850 is demanded from you 
Well I  considered it necessary to inform you about this may be you are following the wrong part  without knowing the simple truth of the reason what your funds is still unpaid
Contact me if you are ready to place application for the funds release 
we take it up from there, if you feel you do not have the money to do this please do not respond , the time is limited to be wasting  on unnecessary email exchange not ready for that
Thanks
Morris Brehen
Chief Documentation Administrative 
Funds Release Controls Director
Barclays Bank PLC London

subject: Re:   From Morris Brehen
body:
Hello Morris Brehen,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message has certainly piqued my interest. It's quite surprising to hear about the Barclays bank using my approved funds in such a manner.

Could you please elaborate more on this? How did the bank get access to these funds and why was I not informed about it earlier? Also, could you explain what you mean by 'funds release processing fee'? 

I'm eager to understand more about this situation and how we can resolve it. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deloris

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Dear  Deloris
To give you more details on this funds at the Barclays Bank PLC, do send to
me your WhatsApp number let me add you do that we can discuss this matter
on a  more condusive atmosphere

I am expecting your response ASAP
Thanks
Morris Brehen

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Dear Doleris
Remember letter to you was self explanatory
you  must have fished out some answers from what you need to know
That funds is an inheritance funds through IMF  and probably you must have
overlooked the first letter that lead to this present situation
Funds release processing fee is the actual  amount the intended funds
receiver like yousekf  are obliged to pay through the documentation officer
who will handle the paper work on your behalf inside the bank and court
order control in your name such expences is known as funds release
processing fee it depends on the amount decision of the handle at time is
above $1000 or less
Send your number let's conclude hope you have a bank account that can
receive such amount of $18m
Till I hear back from you
Thanks
Morris Brehen

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Hello Morris Brehen,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm quite interested in learning more about these funds at the Barclays Bank PLC. However, I prefer to keep our conversation here for now. Could you please provide more details about this matter? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deloris

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Dear Sir
Its an inheritance funds allocated to to you so  if you really want to have
it transferred to your  account it will cost you some amount  i said it
before
$3600 procurement fee
I will not proceed with this unless you are set to move on
Thanks
Morris

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Hello Morris,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about the funds allocated to me. Could you please provide more details about this? Like, how was I chosen for this allocation and what is the purpose of these funds?

Also, you mentioned a fee. Could you clarify what this fee is for and how it contributes to the process?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deloris

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Hello Morris,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by this opportunity. Could you please provide more details about these funds? How were they allocated to me? And what is the process involved in transferring them to my account?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "it will cost you some amount"? What exactly are these costs for and how much would they be?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deloris

subject: Re: From Morris Brehen
body:
Dear Deloris

Make available your bank account details to be used by the bank to register
your properly for the Inheritance funds release more importantly
 the $3600 is very important you must pay off the fee , I will give to you
Bitcoin wallet address you make payment
Please do not be making impossible request which are purely against the
ethics of this institution you should be listening to my directives
accordingly

If you have a WhatsApp  send the numbey to me
So once you provide the required details we can finalize and release those
funds
Answer should be in line with contenta of this message

To enable you meet up time frame
The $3600 is sacrosant unavoidable
Thanks
Morris Brehen
